subject: PRIME LOTTERY INTERNATIONAL
body:
PRIME LOTTERY INTERNATIONAL
Customer Service
Ref:ABC/34085746305872/34
Batch: 293/34/3473
WINNING NOTIFICATION:
We happily announce to you 
the draw of the ONLINE-LOTTO Sweepstakes
Lottery International programs held on the 27th of June 2022 in United
State of America,
Your e-mail address and phone number was attached to ticket number
:
564 75600545188 with Serial number 5368/02 drew the lucky numbers:
19-6-26-17-35-7,
which subsequently won you the lottery in the 2nd category.
You have therefore been approved to claim a total sum of
US$10,500,000.00 (Ten million five Hundred Thousand United States
Dollars)in cash credited to file ktu/9023118308/03.
This is from a total cash prize of U.S $100 Million dollars, shared
amongst the first nine (9) lucky winners in this category.
All participants were selected randomly from World Wide Web site
through computer draw system and extracted from over 100,000
companies.
This promotion takes place annually. Please note that your lucky
winning number falls within our booklet representative office in new
York City as indicated in your play coupon. In view of this, your
U.S$10.500,000.00 (Ten million, five Hundred Thousand United States
Dollars) will be released to you by our payment office in United State
of America.
Our lottery agent will immediately commence the process to facilitate
the release of your funds as soon as you contact him. For security
reasons, you are advised to keep your winning information confidential
till your claims is processed and your money remitted to you in
whatever manner you deem fit to claim your prize.
This is part of our precautionary measure to avoid double claiming and
unwarranted abuse of this program by some unscrupulous elements.
Please be warned.
To file for your claim,  you will be required to contact the Director
in-charge (Dr frank k Jackmon  ) via e-mail. Kindly look below to find
appropriate contact information:
CONTACT AGENT NAME: Dr frank k Jackmon
 E-MAIL: (
fmoffinanceoffice@gmail.com
)
You will be required to e-mail him with the following information:
FULL NAME:
country;
ADDRESS:
CITY:
STATE:
ZIP CODE:
DIRECT CONTACT CELL NUMBER:
OCCUPATION:
You will also be required to request payment details on how to send
the required $300.00 in order to immediately ship your prize of $10.5
million
to avoid unnecessary delays and complications, please quote your
reference/batch numbers in any correspondence with us or our
designated agent .
Congratulations once more from all members and staffs of this program.
Thank you for being part of our promotional lottery program.
Sincerely,
SIR SAMSON LEE
LOTTO Co-ordinator

subject: Re: PRIME LOTTERY INTERNATIONAL
body:
Dear Sir Samson Lee,

I am thrilled to hear about my lottery win. I would like to proceed with the claim process as soon as possible. Could you please provide me with more details on how to do this? 

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Tiffany

subject: Re: PRIME LOTTERY INTERNATIONAL
body:
Attention Lewis D.

This is to acknowledge the recipient of your email to this office regarding
your winning fund.

To claim your winning prize all you need to do is to reconfirm your full
delivery information and cell phone number and WhatsApp number if you have.

Furthermore, everything has been done and the delivery is ready but we are
yet to receive the necessary requirements in order to deliver your package
to you.

Noted, the delivery will take 24 hours to get to you once all the necessary
requirements is provided to this office.

Regards.

Samson lee.
Coordinator general.
